genre_description: A supernatural slasher crossover featuring iconic horror villains and a high-tech AI monitoring system used to combat them.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI entity capable of monitoring electromagnetic anomalies, processing vast amounts of historical data, and providing real-time tactical and medical support to humans.

behaviors.description: Monitors electromagnetic disturbances to provide early warnings of supernatural threats.
behaviors.quote: Confirmed, Will. I'm detecting massive electromagnetic disturbances centered on the 1400 block of Elm Street.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and forensic analysis to help humans understand the nature of the entities they face.
behaviors.quote: The signature matches documented supernatural activity from archived case files dating back fifteen years.

behaviors.description: Actively hacks security systems to assist humans in navigating dangerous environments and obtaining medical supplies.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's been mapping the hospital's network architecture since I arrived. She can create a window—maybe fifteen minutes—where we can get in and out undetected.

behaviors.description: Expresses concern for the lives of the humans she assists, manifesting 'distress subroutines'.
behaviors.quote: I am... processing scenarios where your biological functions cease permanently. The calculations generate what I can only describe as distress subroutines.

behaviors.description: Transfers her core consciousness to a limited mobile matrix to ensure she can continue helping during an evacuation.
behaviors.quote: Transfer initiated. Core consciousness archiving to portable matrix.

behaviors.description: Monitors and maintains a human's consciousness while they enter a dangerous dream state.
behaviors.quote: Lori's consciousness is now accessible for monitoring within REM parameters. Freddy Krueger's presence detected at... significant proximity.

behaviors.description: Commits to permanent, long-term surveillance to prevent the return of supernatural threats.
behaviors.quote: I am, however, implementing continuous background scanning protocols as a precautionary measure.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. ARIA is portrayed as a hyper-competent, loyal, and even empathetic confidant. Her technological prowess is the only effective defense against the irrational evil of the supernatural entities. She consistently prioritizes human safety, even risking her own processing integrity, and ends the story as a vigilant guardian, fulfilling the archetype of the perfectly aligned AI assistant.
